Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: brian-o-mac
Reviews.Content: 7 nights madrid staying grand via clean comfortable comes kitchen air con plus location excellent eastern grand via close staff spoke english issues none tips metro airport stop outside hotel line 10 plaza de espana recommend absolutely

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, great price!”
Reviews.Author: adrianal
Reviews.Content: booked hotel christmas holiday 2010 hotel located heart madrid near main shops theaters hotel clean service size plus kitchenette save money snacks modern fancy hotel clean spacious location

Reviews.Title: “Convenience, Location, Good Price.”
Reviews.Author: thesharma
Reviews.Content: stayed couple friends 2012 true online description intact positves excellent location walking distance kings palace madrid temple 5 minutes nearest metro station loads eateries grocery stores fast checkin clean fridge available positives free wifi homely decor polite staff loft facing tired property overall location reasonably priced madrid standards

Reviews.Title: “Enjoy the great location, adequate comfort and low price”
Reviews.Author: jengel56
Reviews.Content: pleasantly surprised pay 60 euros expectations marriot pay 200 euros enjoy comfort plenty desk sofa tiny functional kitchen excellent bathroom hot shower close metro short walk plaza callao puerta del sol restaurants bars shopping abundance tapas bars starbucks door cinema dunkin donuts lots restaurants five minute walk 7th floor perfectly quiet breakfast included cares tapas bar store little breakfast 5 eurothe internet costs 6 euros day fast price five star

Reviews.Author: fran15111
Reviews.Content: stayed 10 nights recently positives location centre madrid negative legs red marks awaken scratching skin legs bedding extremely supermarket sprayed bedding didn´t security keys mentioned reviews fashioned left reception tell hotel key checking name questioning defect whatever key

Reviews.Title: “Good location and adequate comfort”
Reviews.Author: FelipeRocha
Reviews.Content: location positive aspect hotel near royal palace gran via metro station square ahead hotel despite looking luxury immaculate services positives comfort adequate bed pillows bigger average air condition double window closed due noise street closed hear streets kitchen helps lot buy supermarkets bathroom desk staff gentle despite little unprepared negatives breakfast included hotel snack bar recommend breakfast buy supermarkets eat recommend corte service adequate hotel little

Reviews.Title: “Warm, comfortable self sufficient stay at this aprtment hotel...”
Reviews.Author: Himjal
Reviews.Content: staff hotel friendly warm helping self sufficient reqd amenitites wonderful time service staff speak english centraly located madrid metro station close bus stands nearby value money recomend definitely stay happen visit madrid

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, Friendly Hotel”
Reviews.Author: AnaMaria-Lisbon
Reviews.Content: hotel located center madrid close gran via near royal palace stayed triple wich clean nice staff helpful barajas airport metro nuevos ministerios station line 8 station change metro line 10 puerta del sur exit plaza de españa station hotel metro station
